overview:
Groff is CEO of PBWiki. As CEO, Groff will help PBwiki continue to strengthen its leadership in the collaboration market.

Groff joins PBwiki from Oracle, where he was a senior vice president following Oracle’s 2005 acquisition of TimesTen, Inc., where he was president and CEO. Prior to TimesTen, Groff held executive positions at Apple, which had acquired Network Innovations Corporation, a company Groff founded. Prior to Network Innovations Corp, he held marketing positions with Plexus Computers and Hewlett-Packard.
